assignments.description: Assign target record to variable as hyperlink
assignments.name: assignTargetRec
assignments.label: assignTargetRec

Flow.description: 22/04/2024 Edit entry criteria for using "OR" condition between record type.

formulas.name: EDDAMMRejectEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "] Not Endorse by AMM for New " & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Registration for " &{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: EDDCEORejectEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "] Not Approve by CEO for New " & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Registration for " &{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: EDDEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "] Compliance Advice for Enhance Due Diligence of Required for New " & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Registration for " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: EDDEVPCRejectEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "] Not to register New " & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " for " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: EDDEVPCtoTraderEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "] Propose Counter Party Registration in AMM for " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: EDDNotProceedEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "] Not to Further Proceed Enhance Due Diligence Required for New " & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Registration for " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: EDDTraderEmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "] Enhance Due Diligence Required for New " & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & " Registration for " & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: EmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA] Initial: "& {!$Record.Customer__r.Name} &" Enhance Due Diligence Required for New Customer Registration"

formulas.name: fmlCountry
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Country__r.Code__c}="TH", "Domestic", "International")

formulas.name: fmlOrg
formulas.expression: IF(contains({!getRequestItemRecord.RecordType.DeveloperName}, 'Customer'), TEXT({!getRequestItemRecord.SalesOrganization__c}), IF(contains({!getRequestItemRecord.RecordType.DeveloperName}, 'Supplier'),TEXT({!getRequestItemRecord.PurchasingOrganization__c}),''))

formulas.name: fmlTRCRTeam
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.BusinessUnit__c}, 'TOP', 'TRCR', 'TX', 'FATX', 'LABIX', 'FALB', 'TRCR')

formulas.name: NotifyBody_Approved
formulas.expression: "Customer Information has been approved by Master Data Controller Manager. Please send information to SAP."

formulas.name: NotifyBody_Rejected
formulas.expression: "Customer Information has been rejected by Master Data Controller Manager. Please revise and proceed next step."

formulas.name: NotifyTitle_Approved
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} & "'s" & " Information is Approved."

formulas.name: NotifyTitle_Rejected
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} & "'s" & " Information is Rejected."

formulas.name: NotProceedNotifyTitle
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} & " Enhance Due Diligence Required for New Customer Registration is Not Proceed"

formulas.name: RecordLinkFormula
formulas.expression: LEFT({!$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260}, FIND( '/services', {!$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260})) & {!varTargetRecord}

formulas.name: TOPSupplierApprovedEmailSubject
formulas.expression: '[FYA][' & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & ']: Informing for Approval of New ' & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & ' Registration: ' & {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

formulas.name: TOPSupplierApprovedNotifyBody
formulas.expression: 'This ' & {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} & ' was approved.'

formulas.name: TOPSupplierApprovedNotifyTitle
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} & ' was Approved.'

formulas.name: TRCREmailSubject
formulas.expression: "[FYA][" & {!$Record.SubBU__c} & "] Initial: "& {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} &" New Registration Requires Your Review"

Flow.label: CTRTriggerReqItemNotifyShipto

start.filterLogic: (1 OR 2) AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6) AND (7 OR 8 OR 9)

textTemplates.name: CEOtoTRCRHHEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear TRCR/FALB/FATX Team,


{!$Record.Customer__r.CompanyNameENF__c} completed a trader sheet, conducted a compliance check, uploaded detailed documents, and the credit rating awaits evaluation.

 

Company Name: {!$Record.Customer__r.CompanyNameENF__c}

Interested to be:{!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}: {!$Record.InterestedProductTypeAsCustomerTOP__c}{!$Record.InterestedProductTypeAsCustomerTX__c}{!$Record.InterestedProductTypeAsSupplierTOP__c}{!$Record.InterestedProductTypeAsSupplierTX__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}


Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by EVPC: {!$Record.EVPCReviewEDDResult__c}

Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by AMM: {!$Record.EndorseDueDiligenceResult__c}

Approved Enhanced Due Diligence Result by CEO: {!$Record.ApproveDDbyCEO__c}


Please review due diligence result by proceed via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply to this email address

textTemplates.name: CEOtoTRCRHighEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!fmlTRCRTeam},


{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} completed a trader sheet, conducted a compliance check, uploaded detailed documents, and the credit rating awaits evaluation.

 

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}


Trader Review Result: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceProceedByTrader__c}

EDD Working Team Comment: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceCommentByEDD__c}

Compliance Advice to proceed with the CTR: {!$Record.ComplianceAdviceResult__c}

Enhance Due Diligence Comment by CPCE: {!$Record.CPXXReviewDueDiligenceComment__c}

Review Due Diligence Result by CMVP/SA09: {!$Record.CMVPReviewDueDiligenceResult__c}

Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by EVPC: {!$Record.EVPCReviewEDDResult__c}

Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by AMM: {!$Record.EndorseDueDiligenceResult__c}

Approved Enhanced Due Diligence Result by CEO: {!$Record.ApproveDDbyCEO__c}


Please review due diligence result by proceed via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply to this email address

textTemplates.name: CPCEtoVPEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.fmlPositionNameOfVP__c},


{!$Record.Customer__r.Name} has got high risk level on Compliance Risk. 

Trader Review Result: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceProceedByTrader__c}

EDD Working Team Comment: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceCommentByEDD__c}

Compliance Advice: {!$Record.ComplianceAdviceResult__c}

Enhance Due Diligence Comment by CPCE : {!$Record.CPXXReviewDueDiligenceResult__c}

Please review the due diligence result by proceeding via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply to this email address

textTemplates.name: EDDHHNotProceedtoTraderEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},


{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has high-high final risk level in Compliance. And not proceed with the counterparty registration please inform your customer.


Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by EVPC: {!$Record.EVPCReviewEDDResult__c}

Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by AMM: {!$Record.EndorseDueDiligenceResult__c}

Approved Enhanced Due Diligence Result by CEO: {!$Record.ApproveDDbyCEO__c}


Please review due diligence result by proceed via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatic generated email, please do not reply to this email address

textTemplates.name: EDDHHProceedEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.CTREDDDearHeaderForEmail__c},


{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has high-high final risk level in Compliance. 


Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by EVPC: {!$Record.EVPCReviewEDDResult__c}

Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by AMM: {!$Record.EndorseDueDiligenceResult__c}

Approved Enhanced Due Diligence Result by CEO:  {!$Record.ApproveDDbyCEO__c}


Please review due diligence result by proceed via this link.


Best Regards,

textTemplates.name: EDDHighAMMRejectEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},


{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has high risk level in sanction and compliance. AMM is not endorse to register this company. Please inform the customer.


Trader Review Result: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceProceedByTrader__c}

EDD Working Team Comment:{!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceCommentByEDD__c}

Compliance Advice to proceed with the CTR: {!$Record.ComplianceAdviceResult__c}

Enhance Due Diligence Comment by CPCE: {!$Record.CPXXReviewDueDiligenceComment__c}

Review Due Diligence Result by CMVP/SA09: {!$Record.CMVPReviewDueDiligenceResult__c}

Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by EVPC: {!$Record.EVPCReviewEDDResult__c}

Endorsed Enhanced Due Diligence Result by AMM: {!$Record.EndorseDueDiligenceResult__c}


Please find Enhancement Due Diligence result via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatic generated email, please do not reply to this email address

textTemplates.name: EDDHighEVPCtoTraderEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},


{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has high risk level in sanction and compliance. The result of Enhance Due Diligence is to further proceed counterparty registration. Please process to propose in AMM for approval.


Trader Review Result: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceProceedByTrader__c}

EDD Working Team Comment:{!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceCommentByEDD__c}

Compliance Advice: {!$Record.ComplianceAdviceResult__c}

Please find Enhancement Due Diligence result via this link.


Best Regards,

textTemplates.name: EDDHighNotProceedtoTraderEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},


Commercial team has decided to not further proceed Enhance Due Diligent for {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} as has high risk level in sanction and compliance.Please inform the customer.


Trader Review Result: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceProceedByTrader__c}


Please find due diligence result via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

textTemplates.name: EDDHightoCPCEEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear CPCE Team,


{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has high risk level in sanction and compliance. GLGC team recommended to not register this company. Please find GLGC's advice and further proceed via this link.

Best Regards,

textTemplates.name: EDDHighTraderProceedEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear EDD Working Team,


{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has high risk level in sanction and compliance. Please review due diligence result via this link and further process Enhance Due Diligent.


Trader Review Result: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceProceedByTrader__c}

textTemplates.name: GLGCtoTRCREmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!fmlTRCRTeam},


{!$Record.Customer__r.CompanyNameENF__c} requires your credit evaluation. Please see the EDD Result and proceed via this link.

 

Company Name: {!$Record.Customer__r.CompanyNameENF__c}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}


Trader Review Result: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceProceedByTrader__c}

EDD Working Team Comment: {!$Record.EnhanceDueDiligenceCommentByEDD__c}

Compliance Advice to proceed with the CTR: {!$Record.ComplianceAdviceResult__c}


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply to this email address

textTemplates.name: TOPSupplierApprovedEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},


We would like to inform that {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} was Approved.


Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}


Please see the details and proceed via this link.


Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System

This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this email address

variables.description: Target record ID using with hyperlink
variables.name: varTargetRecord
